system.description:
When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.YNOTCTxDOQMVmtTO]{Recover} within a community you have Fellowship with, you can create a population of androids here. Tell us a unique trait these androids have, and how they fit in with the society you are leaving them to.

You can @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.YE99aLoamM4pDgT7]{Command Lore} about the androids and robots of this world, as well as @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.YE99aLoamM4pDgT7]{Command Lore} about any communities you have left your robots within.
